summary: Transform an image into a Lego mosaic image.
description: Return Image data with a Lego mosaic applied.

parameters.name: nbbricks
parameters.description: The number of bricks to use on the shortest side of the image.

parameters.name: bricksize
parameters.description: The size of the bricks in pixels.

parameters.name: water_threshold
parameters.description: The water threshold percentage for the image.

parameters.name: background
parameters.description: The background color of the image.

returns.description: The image with the Lego mosaic applied.

IndexError.message: The number of bricks is too high for the image size.
